Name: Julep Martini
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of mint leaf or sprig.
Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise).
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with a mint leaf or float the tip of a mint sprig.
Review: A short variation on the classic Julep: lightly sweetened bourbon and mint.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in the mid-1990s by Dick Bradsell .
